name: Iris Chang
title: Co-Head of Tech
desc: Iris is a Master's student studying Professional Writing with a focus on communication design and executive comms. This is her fourth year on tech, and she does stage and event management. In her free time, she enjoys teaching her parakeets new tricks.

name: Shannon Ding
title: Co-Head of Tech
desc: Shannon is a senior studying computer science with a minor in music technology. She does sound and production management in AB Tech. In her spare time, she enjoys audiobooks, trying to play instruments, and long walks (at sunset).

desc.name: Alex Strasser
desc.title: Co-Head of Tech
desc.desc: Alex Strasser is a senior studying ECE and Robotics. He enjoys repairing our equipment, doing lighting for events, and working with event organizers to make events meet their dreams!

desc.name: Felicia Liu
desc.title: Equipment Manager
desc.desc: Felicia is a sophomore studying ECE and BME. Within Tech, she mostly does lighting, but also dabbles in other areas like power and stage management. She loves movies, musicals, manga, and other form of visual media.

desc.name: Queenie Chen
desc.title: Finance Chair
desc.desc: Queenie is a sophomore in Business Administration with a minor in Drama. Inside AB Tech, she is mainly doing stage management and lighting design. Queenie loves musicals.

desc.name: Stella Yim
desc.title: Personnel Manager
desc.desc: Stella is a sophomore studying mechanical engineering. In AB Tech she does a lot of sound and driving trucks. Sometimes she randomly does media or blasts K-pop in techroom while intensely playing UC Stones. Her preferred snacks from Entropy are are dark chocolate Kit-Kats and blue pomegranate Mountain Dew energy drinks.

desc.name: Zara Mansoor
desc.title: Internal Operations Chair
desc.desc: Zara is a sophomore studying Electrical and Computer Engineering. She’s interested in sound in tech but hoping to learn more in other areas as well!

desc.name: Grace Kam
desc.title: Public Relations Chair
desc.desc: Grace is a sophomore studying Materials Science and Biomedical Engineering. She hasn't yet chosen a focus within AB Tech, but is interested in all areas. Her hobbies include baking, playing violin, and sleeping.

desc.name: Clarise Liu
desc.title: Training Chair
desc.desc: Clarise is a sophomore studying computer science. They mainly do lighting & event communication in AB Tech but dabbles in other fields as well. Clarise loves music, animated movies, running, and anything colorful that makes sound.

desc.name: Greta Luo
desc.title: Recruitment & Retainment Chair
desc.desc: Greta is a senior/first year master’s student studying statistics + information systems. In AB Tech, she likes helping out with stage management. She also likes to dance a lot so you might see her choreography (and lighting) in Dancers’ Symposium!
